md:
giải nghĩa từ "breeding" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Breeding /ˈbriːdɪŋ/ (noun)

* Meaning: the process of producing animals or plants by sexual reproduction, especially in a controlled environment, in order to produce offspring with particular characteristics.
* Vietnamese: nuôi giống, lai tạo, sinh sản.

Example sentence: The farmer is involved in breeding cattle to produce high-quality milk.

* Breeding (verb)
	+ Meaning: to produce animals or plants by sexual reproduction, especially in a controlled environment, in order to produce offspring with particular characteristics.
	+ Vietnamese: nuôi giống, lai tạo, sinh sản.

Example sentence: They breed dogs for racing.

Related words:

* Breed (noun): a group of animals or plants that are similar and can produce offspring with similar characteristics.
* Breed (verb): to produce an animal or plant by sexual reproduction, especially in a controlled environment, in order to produce offspring with particular characteristics.
* Hybrid (noun): an animal or plant that is produced by breeding two different species or varieties.
* Crossbreed (verb): to breed two different species or varieties of animals or plants to produce offspring with particular characteristics.

  • Vietnamese: nuôi giống, lai tạo, sinh sản.

  • Breeding (verb)
    • Meaning: to produce animals or plants by sexual reproduction, especially in a controlled environment, in order to produce offspring with particular characteristics.
    • Vietnamese: nuôi giống, lai tạo, sinh sản.

  • Breed (verb): to produce an animal or plant by sexual reproduction, especially in a controlled environment, in order to produce offspring with particular characteristics.
  • Hybrid (noun): an animal or plant that is produced by breeding two different species or varieties.
